version_description:
Please email us at ether@tetherstudios.com if you have any questions, comments, suggestions, or any issues you want to report!

Tutorial added!
• Unclear about how the scoring works? Great! Well.. no, not really .. but we've got you covered! The new tutorial & help screens explain how the game works and how to score the most points.

Bugs Slain
• Sometimes, rarely, once in a blue moon, cards could get stacked upside down. It's somewhat embarrassing, but true. I mean, we've got one job .. stack cards .. and we've been failing. I'm so sorry. But no longer! That bug is fixed!

New Scoring Displays ... ooh, ahhh
• The current time bonus now shows next to the "End Game" button. It doesn't sound like much, but it helps a lot to understand how many points you can get if you cash in early.
• Redrawing the Waste pile deducts points, after you've done it 3 times... but it can be hard to keep track of. We've added a new display on the card stack to make it crystal clear when its free and when it costs you.

Please email us at ether@tetherstudios.com if you have any questions, comments, suggestions, or any issues you want to report!

Tutorial added!
• Unclear about how the scoring works? Great! Well.. no, not really .. but we've got you covered! The new tutorial & help screens explain how the game works and how to score the most points.

Bugs Slain
• Sometimes, rarely, once in a blue moon, cards could get stacked upside down. It's somewhat embarrassing, but true. I mean, we've got one job .. stack cards .. and we've been failing. I'm so sorry. But no longer! That bug is fixed!

New Scoring Displays ... ooh, ahhh
• The current time bonus now shows next to the "End Game" button. It doesn't sound like much, but it helps a lot to understand how many points you can get if you cash in early.
• Redrawing the Waste pile deducts points, after you've done it 3 times... but it can be hard to keep track of. We've added a new display on the card stack to make it crystal clear when its free and when it costs you.

You can find us on Twitter at @tetherstudios if you have any questions, comments, suggestions, or any issues you want to report!

Improved Postgame - 52 Pickup!
• Adding new post-game celebration animation when you clear the full deck.

Bug Hunting
• Nailed a few hard-to-find bugs that probably wouldn't mean anything to you ... but ... um, go team!

You can find us on Twitter at @tetherstudios if you have any questions, comments, suggestions, or any issues you want to report!

Improved Postgame - 52 Pickup!
• Adding new post-game celebration animation when you clear the full deck.

Bug Hunting
• Nailed a few hard-to-find bugs that probably wouldn't mean anything to you ... but ... um, go team!

You can find us on Twitter at @tetherstudios if you have any questions, comments, suggestions, or any issues you want to report!

Can you hear me now?
• Sounds and Music added!

Bug Hunting
• Fixed a bug in the last release that blocked some cash tournaments unnecessarily.
• Fixed a bug with banners causing the initial card layout to be offset.

You can find us on Twitter at @tetherstudios if you have any questions, comments, suggestions, or any issues you want to report!

Can you hear me now?
• Sounds and Music added!

Bug Hunting
• Fixed a bug in the last release that blocked some cash tournaments unnecessarily.
• Fixed a bug with banners causing the initial card layout to be offset.

You can find us on Twitter at @tetherstudios if you have any questions, comments, suggestions, or any issues you want to report!

New Multiplayer Features
• Tiebreakers added! Ties used to refund your entry fee - now you get to play again to determine the winner.
• Bracketed tournaments have been added.

Battery Life Optimization
• We made key improvements to reduce the power consumption during gameplay.

You can find us on Twitter at @tetherstudios if you have any questions, comments, suggestions, or any issues you want to report!

New Multiplayer Features
• Tiebreakers added! Ties used to refund your entry fee - now you get to play again to determine the winner.
• Bracketed tournaments have been added.

Battery Life Optimization
• We made key improvements to reduce the power consumption during gameplay.
New app store details. Same awesome gameplay.
New app store details. Same awesome gameplay.

Optimizations and Improvements
• Updated the home screen to make it easier to get to our other solitaire apps.
• Added daily high scores
• Increase resolution of most UI elements resulting in smoother corners
• Reduced the build size for faster downloads

Fixed some bugs. Whee!
• Fixed a bug where a misplaced tap during the deal could break the draw
• Fixed the card layering logic so cards should never flicker between each other
• Fixed a bug where face-down cards could (sometimes) be dragged around if they were covered by the next logical card
• Fixed a bug where tapping "redraw" when no cards were available would deducts points
• Fixed a bug where quickly tapping re-draw could ignore the second tap - now it deals new cards right away

Optimizations and Improvements
• Updated the home screen to make it easier to get to our other solitaire apps.
• Added daily high scores
• Increase resolution of most UI elements resulting in smoother corners
• Reduced the build size for faster downloads

Fixed some bugs. Whee!
• Fixed a bug where a misplaced tap during the deal could break the draw
• Fixed the card layering logic so cards should never flicker between each other
• Fixed a bug where face-down cards could (sometimes) be dragged around if they were covered by the next logical card
• Fixed a bug where tapping "redraw" when no cards were available would deducts points
• Fixed a bug where quickly tapping re-draw could ignore the second tap - now it deals new cards right away

New Audio
• Changed the sound effects for solving cards to the foundation.

New Video
• Added an app preview!

Bug Fixes
• Fixed a bug where the cards would sometimes fail to auto-solve at the end of a successful match.
